sys_atf_step_config.html_description:
This ATF step generates the current date/time and adds or subtracts a specified duration from it. The operation input determines whether to add or subtract from the current date/time. The duration input should be in the format 'x[d|h|m|s] y[d|h|m|s] ...', where 'x', 'y', etc. are the number of days, hours, minutes, or seconds to add or subtract from the current date/time. The output of this step is the new date/time as a string.

Operation = add or subtract

Duration = amount to add or subtract
sys_atf_step_config.name: Add/Subtract from current date/time
